## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e4ebddc33499a0aed9147da7feee9a2d2c40d1465def49bc4a531a3ec435530b)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'mattermost-developer-documentation' @ 99.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
